item.title: 以色列对哈马斯在卡塔尔的袭击震惊了海湾和加沙停火的机会-NPR
item.description: 以色列对哈马斯在卡塔尔（Katar）造成海湾的攻击和加沙ceasefire的冲动机会 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmikafbvv95cuxnv2pfzk5fumvfzgzgzankpdehbzrgjrgjrywnrqvfftffffffffyqknodvu4aodvu4a1vul4a1vldwzgsgsgsgsgsgsgsgsgzwevzsgsgzsgsgzsgsgsgzsgsgsgzsgsgsgsgsyl xjpawdwbhzft0u1ueftoxpnujywmxrzrzwwwzzekrgrgrncefwqllrc3zer2pbchp2q2q2q2q2wzvndpqmpnmfpynjyxutgtgtgtae9uohohvnz01tous01tous01tous01tous01tous01tous0avbioxbioxbnnat28？ target =“ _ blank”>以色列对卡塔尔的攻击是对美国阿拉伯盟友的警告：数万亿的投资可能不会回报＆nbsp; nbsp; 6f6f6f“> href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmisgfbvv95cuxnb0p1m3bpmvppmk JXA3NJOE02MMW4DFZQC2LZDLO2EHZ2CU9NRWXDNVGZAWDSN3RKWELCU09IWUDWDGHDGH3WNDQCKJ TMW9CZ0I1WJVIYMQ5VLNYWLHBWLFMT1BZZUFNOFPEBNNVM1FSNC01Y3VIQ2ZLZDNYOHZUV3JC dklqs3jvwtbkzuhklwppbgfhevhgutnws0lwlxvenlnwnwnxpkyzcwqxdvb3o3o3o3zha4oeeln？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>美国不能或不会在海湾＆nbsp; nbsp; 经济学家 海湾权力问题以色列在卡塔尔土壤上罢工后的美国保护href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiggfbvvv95cuxnenhytgtfbmdiz3a2bkx6uepistmistrmslbxlbxlwhnnq3npbbrprprk4tekpdznl 1zzhnSelvcuJzzvdvm2JKSDBQNJMYVHBBQLHOZMSYQ3BKZMCZMCZVWXHMEPNLVO4DKXPWGVFNLJ1CTKXBNPOV0ZID2PNSEVVQTEVVQTEWRMDPX29CVZLB？ target =“ _ blank”>石油攀升时，特朗普质疑俄罗斯入侵波兰＆nbsp; nbsp; Yahoo Finance

item.title: 哈里王子与查尔斯国王一年多 - 纽约时报
item.description: 哈里王子在一年多以上与查尔斯国王团聚＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmickfvx3lxte43nvayeglrrb2jiymv3vmn0vuzfdxy1a3r5r5rgixnvvpwpwpwpwpwpwpwwhx aldqoeftx1nmzna2lvvya1ldwfjyatn6x2qta204ndjwatdprla2b0b0njbhp2adnkxzzvuakpjt1jroxlwb0ngb0ngavjb0ngavjbvjbwwdysxlzqq？oc = 5 target =“ _ blank”>国王查尔斯和哈里王子终于在相隔19个月后重聚＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn 哈里王子和查尔斯国王在伦敦团聚一年多了＆nbsp; fox News 哈里王子与父亲查尔斯三世（King Charles III）在一年多年的第一次见面＆nbsp; nbsp; ap news 哈里王子在一年多以上＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc

item.title: 援引俄罗斯无人机侵犯的北约援引北约第4条的知识 - 华盛顿邮报
item.description: 要知道的是北约第4条，引用俄罗斯无人机违规＆nbsp; nbsp; 华盛顿邮报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmivefvx3lxtfbvnf9gumm3d1njvg5qv1qzzzwdm X2VORNQTQMTRX3JMDFKTTE43LXCZTW1FS2FOR2FOR2RLOXO4ZE9PSUZJNXIZBJJON2Y2Y1QJLYQXJSUUFMCG？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>'俄罗斯违反波兰领空是什么？' - 特朗普对北约盟友的莫斯科无人机入侵＆nbsp; bbc 俄罗斯的鲁ck挑衅＆nbsp;＆nbsp; atlantic 波兰'与自第二次世界大战以来的任何时间更接近军事冲突，因为北约盟国权衡对俄罗斯无人机的反应＆nbsp; nbsp; nbsp; 守护者 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMilAFBVV95cUxNZ1MwM2VVYUVDUVVsUVVuYkRUb3J3dXRjRlhodi1kWENqUEtYWHZlQjRLaDJ6aWF3blp HV0JlNFpFTXhNQkF6X3k0ZDZsRjFkVE1MYkNQN0ZVYVZyZ1p4N2xyZGFrMEtYUXFrVjVULVdMWE02NmV0c3pQc3ozQVlaTGVIdWFjMUtJQU1hYWtKbkZkakps?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>意见|普京嘲笑特朗普和北约＆nbsp; 《华尔街日报》

item.title: ‘这是我们的革命。现在轮到我们了：尼泊尔的“ Z世代抗议者”反对腐败 - 监护人
item.description: ‘这是我们的革命。现在轮到我们了’：尼泊尔的“ Z世代抗议者”反对腐败＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmifkfvx3lxte5wdnhndk1hb2vmoglpq3jpd3nfvgi4mfe5lvbadhzgy012muw4edhx ndc3rtnjdnlqyw84ymtptfcxsjjjdthxsehnawxscvphmhvqbv9mwtlybuk4r3bwohnoodvfbwx6nep5y0zhdem3nhzva2nhzva2nlohfjblo5uq？ target =“ _ blank”>火焰中的议会，领导者被推翻。尼泊尔的Gen-Z抗议者问：接下来会发生什么？ href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmigafbvv95cuxpewt3zmexnl9smg94rgwwzgvzgvznlkzel9xvnzvnziqlpppewfqt09vvv1juqn rrswp6wmngtenzd2vmb3rywmlnwnh0n2i5q2danvzksevbv2lcru9bndbqzwn0czdvm2rjsxdxrjsxrjsxdxrjsxrfe0tnvfvgs3zxhjd2hjd2hncwp6yu1lzzlazg？ target =“ _ blank”>对尼泊尔质量Z抗议活动有什么了解 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMitwFBVV95cUxPQkFIUDNOTWlJNXdrTGZpSWh1NnhWenlkVi10MTItMGFoMDc5dldXRFFhZFJYejNYLUlBRDRfS1dySDNKRnFfZjFXSS1 LTGXCU1RZQ3YYSJI5SKHCLXHUBWRNMVJBMDBOLHIME41NMNLZHVYUMRFRWJXWMXONGZKSKSTVAM1 jius12yl9azxdizzrxyzvlddrculrsuzfqnjexd0gztwt4vxvvzvvvznljwvfor3njbuncqtq？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>前尼泊尔PM的妻子受伤时受伤，在住院射击，在医院康复＆nbsp; ndtv 从'Nepo Kids'到PM辞职：尼泊尔抗议活动如何展开＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc

item.title: “阻止一切”抗议法国抗议，加剧了对马克龙的压力-NBC新闻
item.description: '阻止一切'抗议法国，加剧了对马克龙的压力＆nbsp; nbc new> nbc news <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiogFBVV95cUxQOFRubVZFQnFfQmpzbFNCNVRCSWV5SmJneG1QdHM2SFJQX195TnRZb255YzFrZ1lGcE l5ynlmehl3n3lwb3zlefluzy1svup2ek1zvzy5zviwdmnynwjkd3jdvwwpjzgh2mnbfn1ffn1ffnwvnwvbtwpacvrnrznrznrznnnnnq22re 1MmFoWWFlQzhDdkHSAacBQVVfeXFMTmpxU21DNzBWYUxuVGRHRkIzY0pUMzNiaWpqTTYyYTBlUWVyTTZhcGQ0Nm1IbHFHbnJVUWNtdEJvS1k0YVdtckJoLW9NWm5a v2vfulfjyks1ndlxmnjprlfuahjmetlnnmzpbjbjbjbjbvmtsczl0c21nckpha1z0bvpmuthfrxbsbsbsbsbsbsbsbsbsbsbsbsbsbsw84z1jmnhdoqjzabfiztzabfiztzvhymvh5swh5spthjmvh5sw1fthj1fthjletzdsvnlk？ target =“ _ blank”>法国逮捕了数百人，因为'阻止一切'抗议活动爆发＆nbsp;＆nbsp; fox News “阻止一切”抗议法国：＆nbsp; nbsp; 《华尔街日报》 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmixwfbvv95cuxovhnbuxoxmlrtsjfzsdvnl W1HNVFZCJVBS21ZM3KWZKN2N3LVC1DNCXAYNMDKBWNTWXDHSTJ0CE1UES00V3ZEQ0SZDUJMUWHWMXN3W etft3ptd2f4znqxsmlfahrqswrtemnrngpfrvbvudu4cmhhowfqa1luwgfmntkzmxkzmxk3tgdgrhneuuduc vgwtvlrnefmcke0wjlpsu52dhjzdw92cfnnckpyqml5vfjpngsxclzxclz3ndlzafruudvrcmlxtllv？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>'我的第一个障碍'：法国抗议活动团结老师，吉利特人和学生＆nbsp; nbsp; huverian href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmikafbvv95cuxoqznhnhtiwz2ncstbtmjblzw5ym2nxc1kxc1kxv1fqzmdiu2pasgruoxgruoxuoxuoxuwchm2ewpvsm2ewpvsm83n 3LTMWU3DHMZBTBEWUU5M0F1DXNGOHF2EDNXMU05VFRPVEWWWWWWZBBYTKTKTKTFNWWNUMTIUUMTIUWY2BLDSWNVNVTMW9PELNRCUTKAC11C194DS194DS194DS15CUWW5CUW5CUW5CUW5R1HWWLBRREQ？ target =“ _ blank”>在巴黎大加尔（Gare du Nord）火车站附近的警察和抗议者之间发生冲突

item.title: 韩国妇女在强奸期间咬了攻击者的舌头数十年 - 《纽约时报》
item.description: 在尝试强奸期间咬攻击者的舌头＆nbsp; 《纽约时报》 韩国妇女，在61年后咬了攻击者的舌头＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc 61年后咬住攻击者的舌头＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmisafbvv95cuxnx01ynuzjalizvtv0y1rqtfludxftngf0cmmrycmrycmryccmryccmryccmryccmryccmryccmrycc1eg56e1eg56c2hrqulxnwhrqulxnwhrqulyyszznhninhninhninhhmzzhhmzzhhmzzhhmzznhmzznhmzznhmzznhm zeffryymzznhm’f FDWMFTWKLOQ0XSM090TUJISMY0MW1ASTQ4CGVPD1L2NERLLLVBGYZBEYZBEY0LIYJF0X3NRUWCYUKP twk5jbjcxumvkt3piafc3cudssfzqnkxmyvldmjn0mk1ymnv0mjjnzuvickrgdlpknw？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”> Bit Attacker's Tongue Off的韩国妇女1964年被定罪＆nbsp; nbsp; 澳大利亚广播公司
